title: Vibe for Wear
summary: This app is dual vibe with multi pattern. Both wear and mobile devices viberate.
description: THIS APPLICATION IS FOR ANDROID WEAR. THE USER NEEDS TO HAVE BOTH ANDROID WEAR AND SUPPORTING MOBILE DEVICES.Vibe for Wear app is a dual vibrator.Both the Android wear and the mobile devices vibrate at the same time.Multipul vibration patterns are included.Launching the Vibe for Wear app on the Android wear, vibration starts on both devices.To change the vibration pattern, long press the application display on the Android wear.The app automatically tries to keep being front on the wear without any operation.To stop the application, exit the Vibe for Wear by swiping left to right in normal way.It tries to stop the vibration on mobile too. The power-on key is also effective to stop the vibrationi only for the mobile device.
descriptionHTML:
THIS APPLICATION IS FOR ANDROID WEAR.
THE USER NEEDS TO HAVE BOTH ANDROID WEAR AND SUPPORTING MOBILE DEVICES.

Vibe for Wear app is a dual vibrator.
Both the Android wear and the mobile devices vibrate at the same time.
Multipul vibration patterns are included.

Launching the Vibe for Wear app on the Android wear, vibration starts on both devices.
To change the vibration pattern, long press the application display on the Android wear.

The app automatically tries to keep being front on the wear without any operation.

To stop the application, exit the Vibe for Wear by swiping left to right in normal way.
It tries to stop the vibration on mobile too. The power-on key is also effective to stop the vibrationi only for the mobile device.
